snippet: Imagining led all the way in the $400,000 Man o’ War, giving the Hall of Fame trainer Shug McGaughey his third straight victory in the event.
abstract: Imagining wins Man o' War stakes at Belmont Park, giving trainer Shug McGaughey his third straight victory in the event.
lead_paragraph: Imagining led all the way in the $400,000 Man o’ War, giving the Hall of Fame trainer Shug McGaughey his third straight victory in the event.
